titles: A ballat intituled Northomberland newes vvherin you maye see what rebelles do vse. Come tomblinge downe come tomblinge downe. That will not yet be trewe to the crowne.
author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?
place: Imprinted at London in Paules Churcheyarde, at the signe of the Lucrece :
notes: Verse - "You northcountrie nodies whie be ye so bragge".
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Rebellion of 1569 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
